description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a user registration screen. It includes UI components such as text fields for username, email, password, and confirm password, uses Riverpod for state management, and handles form validation and registration logic.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget representing the registration screen, built as a ConsumerStatefulWidget for state management with Riverpod.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the registration form's UI and logic within the RegisterScreen widget.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the RegisterScreen widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the Flutter widget tree for the registration UI, handling input validation, form submission, and dynamic UI updates.
